description: The Telemark revolution bears from the concept of a product of extraordinary performances. Shell and Cuff in Pebax® with micrometrical buckles for a high-level fitting; the rear mechanism for a quick change from Walk to Ski mode. Maximum skiing stability thanks to the “Carbon Side Support” system exclusively patented by CRISPI®. The revolutionary cuff with double density injection gives rigidity and support; the special “Bellow Flex Control” allows an outstanding flexion. Available with CRISPI® Dynamic Liner (Thermoformable).<br><br>Compatible with NTN and Low Tech binding. Crispi are the only telelmark boot manufacturer to include tech inserts at the toe and heel.<br><br>***Note: with all Crispi NTN boots– the distance between the tech toe pins and the back of the NTN “heel” is slightly shorter than on Scarpa boots, and this means the smaller boot sizes are prone to pre-releasing from the small sized Meidjo binding. For this reason, we do not recommend using Crispi boots with the small size Meidjo binding (mondo size 26 or smaller). The large binding does not have the same problem.
name: EVO World Cup NTN
